Title: 8 Tried and True Edtech Tools to Try in 2018 (e222)
Description:
Sometimes the best tools have been around awhile. Steve Dembo @teach42 talks about the tried and true tools that teachers should still use.

www.coolcatteacher.com/e222

Richard Byrne has some fantastic courses for history teachers, getting started with GSuite and more. Check out his courses and coaching at www.coolcatteacher.com/edtech.
